plot: A 16 year old boys falls in love for an 18 year old girl. Having no experience with woman, the boy tries to be all the things he thinks a girl would look for in a guy.
title: A Hopeless Romantic
plot_es: A 16 year old boys falls in love for an 18 year old girl. Having no experience with woman, the boy tries to be all the things he thinks a girl would look for in a guy.
plot_en: A 16 year old boys falls in love for an 18 year old girl. Having no experience with woman, the boy tries to be all the things he thinks a girl would look for in a guy.
